item.description:
Have closets and drawers full of rubber stamps that you've used once or twice and now don't know what to do with? Our own inimitable Patty Martucci is going to lead a fabulous workshop full of tricks and techniques for rubber stamping for use in all of our art endeavors, whether you're creating ATCs or art journals or chunky books. And, back by popular demand, Judy Noonan is going to teach some techniques as well.

So reserve the date now. We'll be supplying the vast majority of the materials you'll need to participate in this great class, but will let you know in the next couple of months what you'll need to bring.

Come join us and learn some great stamping techniques.

Rozsi

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Stamping Techniques Workshop
